title: General Physics Quiz
description: Here are a few questions for General Physics

questions.question: Alice is moving 50 meters per second due east. Bob is moving 30 meters per second due west. What is the relative velocity of Alice to Bob?

options.label: A
options.more: Since Alice and Bob are moving in opposite directions, add their velocities together.

options.label: B
options.more: This would be true if they were moving in the same direction.

options.label: C
options.more: Alice and Bob are traveling in opposite directions.

options.label: D
options.more: This would be true if they were both moving in the same direction at the same velocity.

questions.question: What is the temperature at which water boils at sea level?

options.label: A
options.more: This is the boiling point of water.

options.label: B
options.more: This is the freezing point of water.

options.label: C
options.more: This is roughly room temperature, not the boiling point of water at sea level.

options.label: D
options.more: This is the temperature of the surface of the sun.
